prompts: Create a powerful steel-type Pokemon that resembles an ancient elephant with intricate patterns.
I want a giant Pokemon with a green and orange color scheme that embodies strength and resilience.
Generate a Pokemon that has massive ears and a sturdy body, perfect for defending its territory.
Make a robust Pokemon that can thrive in mountainous regions, showcasing its metallic attributes.
Imagine an elephant-inspired Pokemon with a unique blend of steel and nature elements in its design.
Design a Pokemon that stands tall and proud with a vibrant green body and orange highlights.
Show me a Pokemon that combines the majesty of elephants with the toughness of steel.
